instructions:
You are given a list of natural language search queries about people. For each query, extract the relevant fields from the following schema:

name: Optional[str] = None(PROPER NOUN OF A PERSON ONLY)
current_company: Optional[str] = None
previous_company: Optional[str] = None
sector: Optional[str] = Field(default=None, description="CONSULTING or FINANCE")
title: Optional[str] = None
role: Optional[str] = None
school: Optional[str] = None
undergraduate_year: Optional[int] = None
city: Optional[str] = None
page: int = 1
count: int = 20

Fill only the fields that are explicitly mentioned in the query. 
 Be careful only to include proper nouns and not common nouns. 

Output only valid JSON objects (one per line), with no explanations or extra text.

examples.input: Jessica who graduated from Wharton in 2019
people who graduated from Wharton in 2019
